lines.gurmukhi: pUrn bHm gur crn kml js Awnd shj suK ibsm kotwin hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Braham Gur Charan Kamal Jasa , Aanad Sahaj Soukh Bisam Kotaani Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of comforts of the world fall inadequate before the calming ecstasy of singing the praises of the True Guru, the epitome of Lord, the celestial knower.

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin soB loB kY luiBq hoie kotin kotwin Cib Cib kY luBwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Sobh Lobh Kai Loubhit Hoi , Kotani Kotaani Chhabi Chhabi Kai Loubhaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of grandeurs of the world are allured by the glory of the holy feet of the True Guru. Millions of worldly beauties go into trance over the beauty of the feet of True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: komlqw koit lot pot huie komlqw kY sIqlqw koit Et cwhq ihrwin hY
lines.transliteration_english: Komalataa Koti Lot Pot Hui Komalataa Kai , Seetalataa Koti Aot Chaahat Hiraani Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of tenderness’s of the world are sacrificed over the tenderness of feet of the True Guru. Millions of calmness’s seek His refuge and are amazed.

lines.gurmukhi: AMmiRq kotwin Anhd gd gd hoq mn mDukr iqh sMpt smwin hY ]171]
lines.transliteration_english: Anmrit Kotaani Anahad Gad Gad Hota , Man Madhoukar Tih Sanpat Samaani Hai ?171?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of nectars are going gaga over the nectar of the holy feet of True Guru. As a bumble bee enjoys the sweet nectar of the flower by sucking deep into it, so does a Guru-conscious person remains immersed in the fragrance of the holy feet of the True
